title: Eyre.ai Secure AI Meeting Platform
description:
Eyre.ai is an AI meeting platform for secure, confident conversations. Eyre Meet boosts communication with real-time speech assistant, meeting notes, transcripts, agendas. Offering secure, private P2P calls and seamless Google Meet integration, Eyre Meet is all about safety and confidence. Here's what makes us different:

✅ AI notetaker, meeting agenda and transcript generator
✅ Secure, private P2P video calls
✅ Meeting prompter to keep you focused and prepared.

Try our MVP and share feedback!
